Title: Fear Her
Writer: Pete McTighe, Reg Watson (creator), Lara Radulovich (creator)
Actors: Danielle Cormack, Nicole da Silva, Kate Atkinson, Celia Ireland
Plot: The extent of Bea's plan is revealed as she makes the final moves to avenge Debbie's death. Meanwhile Franky realises she is losing the support of the women and is forced to consider a deal.
